title: Software Engineer
details: Developed in-house Blazor web applications using C#, .NET Core, and SQL Server, delivering intuitive solutions to support critical business needs.
Debugged and optimized stored procedures for B2B data pipelines, ensuring reliable data flow for consumer product websites.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement feature enhancements, improving user experience and operational efficiency.

title: Software Engineer
details: Modernized Blazor Server UI with clean, user-friendly layouts, enhancing visual flow and usability for internal business processes.
Built and maintained backend APIs using C#, ASP.NET Core, and Web API, exceeding client requirements and improving platform scalability.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with Azure DevOps and Git branching strategies, reducing bugs and streamlining agile development sprints.

title: Software Engineer
details: Developed and enhanced Transportation and Logistics software using C#, .NET, and Python, integrating new carrier support to improve platform functionality.
Built and maintained APIs to support seamless data exchange for logistics applications, ensuring robust backend services.
Collaborated in agile team settings, participating in code reviews and brainstorming sessions to resolve complex issues.

title: Software Developer
details: Performed full-stack development using Java, JSP, and SQL, delivering scalable applications for hours reporting tailored to client needs.
Optimized application performance by addressing bottlenecks in SQL queries and backend logic, improving user experience.
Mentored new hires, promoting best practices and fostering a collaborative team environment.
